Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Hunt {@LinkCreature:39#160#dreadfang arachnens} and {@LinkCreature:39#280#arachnen devastators}, and bring back their venomous fangs as proof of their deaths.

Report to Anwold at Sanctuary when your mission is complete.
Fine work, <PCNAME>. We appreciate a job well done!
Please complete your mission orders as soon as you can.
